name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Magic by Breakcold - Social Selling CRM

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Breakcold is a Social Selling CRM but also a Sales CRM with an easy to use sales pipeline management tool.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Breakcold is the first sales CRM where you can within the CRM engage your prospects with LinkedIn. From one place you can like (1), comment (2) and send messages (3) to prospects from ONE place rapidly.

It's basically a sales CRM with social selling capabilities, think of it as an email and LinkedIn CRM.

With this google chrome extension, you can:
- engage with your leads on LinkedIn and Twitter
- add prospects to Breakcold Sales CRM directly from LinkedIn and +7 other platforms.

The mission of Breakcold is to help small businesses to close deals in 2024, not 2010.
